Sustainability Report 202056
Design for Sustainability 
Promoting Circular Economy 
Product Safety
Supply Chain ResponsibilityKey Highlights
Launched the Growth Technical 
Advisory Board  to accelerate 
technology solutions that address 
global challenges
Shifted  75%  of airfreight between 
China and Singapore to lower-
emission road freight
Reduced the weight of our 
packaging  crate design by 50% Expanded scope of Design for 
Sustainability COE to design, 
model, test, and quantify 
innovations that reduce 
environmental impact  across our 
portfolio and business units
Established the SuCCESS2030 
Office  to oversee metrics and 
conduct compliance audits, 
training, and coordination with 
participating suppliers
Advanced innovations in 
recyclable mono- and two-layer 
flexible packaging solutions
